e400: Bad Request: The server cannot process the request due to client error
Invalid syntax in the request parameters
The request could not be understood by the server
Missing required parameters in the request
e401: Unauthorized: Authentication is required to access this resource
You must log in to access this resource
e402: Payment Required: The requested resource requires payment
Please upgrade your account to access this feature
e403: Forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource
Access denied due to insufficient privileges
Your IP address has been blocked
Resource access restricted to authorized users only
e404: Not Found: The requested resource could not be located
The page you're looking for doesn't exist
Resource has been moved or deleted
The requested item is no longer available
e405: Method Not Allowed: The requested HTTP method is not supported
This endpoint doesn't support the specified HTTP method
Invalid HTTP method for this resource
Please check the API documentation for supported methods
HTTP method not supported for this endpoint
e406: Not Acceptable: Cannot generate response matching Accept headers
e407: Proxy Authentication Required: Authentication with proxy server needed
Please authenticate with the proxy first
e408: Request Timeout: The server timed out waiting for the request
Client took too long to send the complete request
Connection timed out while waiting for data
Please try submitting your request again
e409: Conflict: Request conflicts with current state of the server
Cannot process due to resource state conflict
e410: Gone: The requested resource is no longer available
This version of the API has been deprecated
Resource not available at this location
e411: Length Required: Content-Length header is required
Cannot process request without content length
e412: Cannot proceed due to failed preconditions
e413: Payload Too Large: Request entity exceeds limits
Request data exceeds maximum allowed size
Please reduce the size of your request
e414: URI Too Long: The requested URL exceeds server limits
URL length exceeds maximum allowed characters
Request URL is too long to process
Please shorten the URL and try again
e415: Unsupported Media Type: Request format not supported
Server doesn't support this media format
Media type not accepted by the server
e416: Range Not Satisfiable: Cannot fulfill requested range
Cannot serve the requested content range
e417: Expectation Failed: Server cannot meet Expect header requirements
Expected condition could not be fulfilled
e418: I'm a teapot: Server refuses to brew coffee with a teapot
This server is a teapot, not a coffee maker
Coffee brewing request denied by teapot
Hyper Text Coffee Pot Control Protocol error
Cannot brew coffee using teapot protocol
e421: Misdirected Request: Server is not able to produce a response
Request was directed to wrong server
Request cannot be processed by this server
e423: Resource temporarily unavailable due to lock
Please wait for resource lock to clear
e424: Failed Dependency: Request failed due to previous request failure
Cannot proceed due to failed dependency
e425: Too Early: Server unwilling to risk processing early request
Request arrived too early to process
e426: Upgrade Required: Client must upgrade protocol
e428: Precondition Required: Request must be conditional
e429: Too Many Requests: Rate limit exceeded
Too many requests in time window
e431: Request Header Fields Too Large: Header fields too large
e451: Unavailable For Legal Reasons: Content legally restricted
Access denied due to legal restrictions
Cannot serve content due to legal constraints
e500: Internal Server Error: Something went wrong on our end
Server encountered an error processing request
System error, please try again later
e501: Request method not supported by server
Feature not available on this server
Server does not support this operation
e502: Bad Gateway: Invalid response from upstream server
e504: Gateway Timeout: Upstream server timed out
Gateway failed to get timely response
e505: HTTP Version Not Supported: HTTP version not supported
Please use a supported HTTP version
e506: Variant Also Negotiates: Server configuration error
e507: Insufficient Storage: Server out of storage
Cannot process due to storage limits
e508: Loop Detected: Infinite loop detected in request
Cannot complete due to infinite loop
e511: Network Authentication Required: Network access requires authentication
